text: Androids don't just dream of electric sheep, they bring them to the Silicon Slaughterhouse and take their powers.
author: Slapperfish

text: No, they're being creative.  I could have given a hundred other electricity boss names.  Shock Man, Volt Man, Stun Man, Bolt Man.  The creators calling this boss "Sheep Man" is just what I like to call "Japanese creativity."  Also, have you ever read the book "Do Androids Dream Of Electric Sheep?" which was later adapted into the movie "Bladerunner?"  For some reason I have a feeling that whoever created Sheep Man did, and that's why we have a Mega Man electricity boss that's a sheep.Just sayin'
author: Jesse James
